title: Did Rudy Giuliani Suggest Borrowing a Legal Tactic from ‘My Cousin Vinny’?
subtitle: A news conference held by President Donald Trump's legal team was part of a disinformation campaign falsely alleging mass voter fraud in the November 2020 general election.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump's personal attorney Rudy Giuliani suggested using a legal tactic seen in the 1992 movie "My Cousin Vinny" in a court case about 2020 voting.
